directions: In a small bowl stir together the vinegar, the minced mint, and the sugar, let the mixture stand for 30 minutes, and force it through a fine sieve set over a bowl, pressing hard on the solids. Arrange 3 wedges of the melon on each of 4 chilled plates and drizzle each serving with some of the vinegar mixture. Drape each serving of melon with a slice of the prosciutto and garnish the plates with the mint sprigs.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons minced fresh mint leaves plus mint sprigs for garnish
twelve 1/4-inch-thick wedges of seeded and peeled honeydew melon or cantaloupe
title: Melon and Prosciutto with Balsamic Vinegar and Mint
